title: Max Grüger
content:
Max Grüger (born 24 May 2005) is a German professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for 2. Bundesliga club Schalke 04.[1]

Grüger signed a professional contract with Schalke 04 on 6 June 2024, lasting until 2026.[2] He made his first team debut for the club in the 2. Bundesliga in a 2–1 away win against Preußen Münster on 28 September 2024.[3] On 23 December 2024, he extended his contract with Schalke until 2028.[4]

Grüger has represented Germany at under-19 and under-20 level.[5]
